entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times mixed with snow near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
